text: [ Photo by : Disney Channel ] Fans of early 2000s Disney might recall one of the greatest futuristic shows to ever grace the channel, Phil Of The Future. While the end of the show made our hearts break ( and we'd be lying if we said we're over it ), this sweet reunion between the two responsible for our heartbreak is a step in the right direction. Read more : A live - action ‘ Kim Possible ’ movie is in the works For those of you who didn't obsessively watch the show ( we can't imagine why ), the show followed the lives of the Diffy family, a futuristic family from the year 2121 who got stuck in the year 2004 after their time machine broke during a family vaction.
